page.title: 02TRANSPORT - CROSSROADS
page.content: Our area is{rural}so there are no A roads. We made surveys for the{three {main crossroads}in our block. Each week we went out at{1:30}and returned at{2:00pm.}After our visits we made a graph. The{Highlanes}and{Padstow crossroads were busier than{St. Merryn crossroads.We think its because Highlanes and Padstow are main roads and eventually join the{A:30 road.It was also{lunchtime}and not many vehicles were on the road;lorries usually{unload}in the{morning.}There were many cars along the main roads at Highlanes and Padstow. A{dustcart}and {bus}were seen at Padstow and Highlanes on two of the Tuesdays which means that a bus travels from{Padstow to {Wadebridge}at that time.We completed these surveys in{April}and{May}before the onslaught of{summer traffic. .
